ygData.subject: RE: Re: Bad Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: if ya really wanna have some fun, once you get in your 30 s go play lullaby in blackburrow around the bridge, and then switch to screech, amazing how gnolls
ygData.messageBody:
if ya really wanna have some fun, once you get in your 30's go play lullaby
in blackburrow around the bridge, and then switch to screech, amazing how
gnolls stick together 8)

Minkin
Sol ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Danny Craigg [SMTP:danny@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 3:05 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Bad Bard
>
> From: "Danny Craigg" <danny@...>
>
> Taneran wrote:
> ----------
> I did get scolded once though:
> "What happened to the Solesek Champion? WTF?"
> "Ooops, hit the charm hot key instead of anthem. Sorry"
> "Take that off your hot key now please"
> "No prob, already gone 8)"
> ----------
>
> Heh, I had a similar experience in the Ghost room in Unrest at a time when
> the party was not in the best of shape, and hadn't been keeping the hall
> as
> clear due to a couple linkdeaths.
>
> Ranger: "Why is he [the ghost] running??"
> <Bard looks and sees "flees in terror">
> Bard: "Uhm, EVAC"
> <At North Karana spires>
> Bard whistles innocently.
>
> Raiel Kendan, Traveling Minstrel of Karana
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
